text.section:
A person may not erect, construct, reconstruct, alter, maintain, or use a building, structure, or equipment or use land:
in a way that endangers life or property due to the hazards of fire or explosion; or
in violation of any regulation adopted by the Commission under § 6-206 of this title.
Each day on which a violation of this section continues after knowledge or official notice of the violation is a separate offense.
